title: Woof, Woof! Meow, Meow! We Love Your Furry Friends!
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 990 Sq.
Imagine your oasis; a vision of comfort, convenience and peace of mind.
At Avana Stoneridge, we understand the importance of finding balance.
That's why we have designed a home specifically with you in mind, to support all of your needs in life, work and play.

Situated in the heart of Hacienda Business Park, home to over 500 diverse employers and arguably ranked among the best Schools in California, Avana Stoneridge is just steps away from boundless opportunities.
If you're up for some fun on your day off, the area boasts 12 acres of beautiful parks just waiting to be explored, along with a wide variety of recreational activities.
Not to mention the Main Street charm, shopping and fine dining options that await you just moments away in Downtown Pleasanton.
No matter what it is you're looking for, you're never far from it.
Find your perfect balance at Avana Stoneridge.
- High speed internet and cable ready
- Convenience of in-home washers and dryers*
- Hacienda Business Park (24-hour courtesy patrol, parks, recreation and free commuter options)
- Resident Community Room With Wi-Fi Access
